channel.title: [Aggroth] 317 [BACK ONLINE]
channel.description:
[size=36pt][font=impact]Aggroth, where dreams go real.[/font][/size]
[img]http://puu.sh/3K1Sd.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3K1TA.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3K1Zi.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3K1XX.jpg[/img]
[size=10pt]Aggroth, a brand new server by Shaloxis, We have been working so hard to make this server the absolute best... We have added so many features... Please, before you flame give us a chance.[/size]
[url=http://aggroth.tk/]Website[/url] [url=http://aggrothforums.webege.com]Forums[/url] [url=http://aggroth.comoj.com/webclient.php]Webclient[/url] [url=http://aggroth.comoj.com/download.php]Download[/url]
[size=10pt]Features: -Some nice goodie's every server should have :P [img]http://puu.sh/3K1OX.jpg[/img] -Full leech prayers, + torva/pernix/virtus effects [img]http://puu.sh/3K1tl.jpg[/img] -All new rs boots + stats added [img]http://puu.sh/3K0dL.jpg[/img] -The new fire cape (Tokhaar-Kal) added 100% + stats [img]http://puu.sh/3K0rX.png[/img] -A new custom tab, much will be added [img]http://puu.sh/3K11F.jpg[/img] -Aggroth points, or level points, achieved when you level up a skill. [img]http://puu.sh/3K15e.png[/img] -Also we have a PK points store [img]http://puu.sh/3K17L.jpg[/img] -All 25 stats work 100% [img]http://puu.sh/3K1ai.png[/img] -Some custom npc's, and the trade with and talk to options actually work... [img]http://puu.sh/3K1jo.jpg[/img] -A playerstats NPC [img]http://puu.sh/3K1kA.png[/img] -A casket system - buy a casket, click it to get your money back, for more then max cash. [img]http://puu.sh/3K1q4.jpg[/img] -A full ingame-toggles system [img]http://puu.sh/3K21g.png[/img] -A FULLY working trivia, with good rewards [img]http://puu.sh/3K23n.png[/img] -Total level is fully fixed, also no more lvl 3 = all 99s xD [img]http://puu.sh/3K2aH.png[/img] -A good alert system with a nice image [img]http://puu.sh/3K2d3.jpg[/img] -All alters at home [img]http://puu.sh/3K2eR.jpg[/img] -Custom owner crowns :) [img]http://puu.sh/3K2gd.png[/img] -A good donor tab [img]http://puu.sh/3K2hx.png[/img] -A perfect donator zone, with shops and a reset NPC, also some dungeons. [img]http://puu.sh/3K2k0.jpg[/img] -Really 100% dicing, you need to be in chat, correct emote, correct percentiles, ALL of it [img]http://puu.sh/3K2mY.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3K2pr.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3K2qA.png[/img] -Alot of nice teleports, more bosses will be added [img]http://puu.sh/3K2vR.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3K2xr.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3K2zB.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3K2AG.jpg[/img] -Many more fun content added, like mystery boxes, donor lamps... Double & quad xp rings... and more [img]http://puu.sh/3K2Cf.png[/img] -A full sagittarian bow + special attack [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B-ywrXqEJsk&feature=youtu.be[/youtube] [/size]
Owner Skype: Waddafoock
Join us now, at http://aggroth.tk/ (working on the link) xD

item.title: [Aggroth] 317 [BACK ONLINE]
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

Looks exactly like every other 317 server loading 600 + data. I do think the custom interface is a good start, but you need more than one unique feature to define a server.

Read full topic

[size=36pt][font=impact]Aggroth, where dreams go real.[/font][/size]




[size=10pt]Aggroth, a brand new server by Shaloxis,
We have been working so hard to make this server the absolute bestâ€¦
We have added so many featuresâ€¦
Please, before you flame give us a chance.[/size]

[size=10pt]Features:
-Some nice goodieâ€™s every server should have

-Full leech prayers, + torva/pernix/virtus effects

-All new rs boots + stats added

-The new fire cape (Tokhaar-Kal) added 100% + stats

-A new custom tab, much will be added

-Aggroth points, or level points, achieved when you level up a skill.

-Also we have a PK points store

-All 25 stats work 100%

-Some custom npcâ€™s, and the trade with and talk to options actually workâ€¦
